fields.title: Tint Method
fields.description: Tint multiplied to the color. Tint method logic varies, but often refers to the "rain" and "temperature" of the biome the block is placed in to compute the tint.

description: [Note: This component is currently experimental]. Sets the particles that will be used when block is destroyed.

generated_doNotEdit.title: Destruction Particles
generated_doNotEdit.description: Sets the particles that will be used when block is destroyed. This component can be omitted.

fields.title: Texture
fields.description: The texture name used for the particle.

fields.title: Tint Method
fields.description: Optional, tint multiplied to the color. Tint method logic varies, but often refers to the "rain" and "temperature" of the biome the block is placed in to compute the tint. Supported tint methods are "none", "default_foliage", "birch_foliage", "evergreen_foliage", "dry_foliage", "grass" and "water"
